description:
🌌 THE TRAIL – Official Trailer (2025) | Prime Video | Alien Abduction Thriller in 4K
Disappearances. Lights in the sky. A path no one returns from. The Trail is Prime Video’s eerie new alien-abduction thriller set deep in the American wilderness — where something is watching… and waiting.

⭐ Movie Overview

When a group of hikers ventures off-route in a remote national forest, they stumble upon an unmarked trail infamous for decades of strange vanishings. As night falls, their phones go dead, the forest distorts around them, and a silent presence begins tracking their every move.
The deeper they go, the clearer it becomes: they’re not alone — and they’re not meant to escape.
